html:
4.16.18  8:17 pm   4.15.18  10:29 pm well since you asked, i think your longest song on the site (bob marley) is one of your best, because you have lots of time to explore the various directions that the song could go in

and while other artists mostly make short songs, it's not extremely uncommon see a song that is six minutes long, or sometimes even longer. so i found it unusual that you have written a huge number of them but none in the list are five minutes

with that said the length of songs you make is entirely your choice and i respect your creative process, i was just curious if you chose to make shorter songs on account of recording time, feeling like they get repetitive, or something else entirely

4.16.18  6:59 pm   I'm in Poland, drunk, and I want to write a song with the chord progression C A B B A G E, should I write this song?

4.16.18  6:55 pm   So I asked you if the notes: C B A G E, played in that order a bit fast means anything to you.

It's actually from your song, la de da de da de da de day oh. It's from the 1st verse right after you sing "and believe them too".

      Maybe you got the inspiration from looney tunes.

      Cool.

4.16.18  11:44 am   I want to have a band, but I want to do my own music and write all the parts and have full creative control over everything. But if I have that attitude, nobody will want to be in my band. What do I do?
4.16.18  11:20 am   what are you waiting for

4.16.18  11:13 am   i find, er, i don't concentrate enough, which means i got less done than i thought i should have, but obviously i don't want to admit my stamina is that bad and for what i think there is still a lot of space for improvement. i've tried some strategies, say, unplugging my internet connection, 3 hours a row with half an hour break, but still my mind strays easily, and my attention intensity flats like a popped balloon. little progress made in whatever i'm trying to accomplish, which dishearten me very often. i bet there's some strategies you use that works well for you. would please share or give some suggestions?

4.16.18  2:16 am   when you go "youre made to do the things you do" i get a surge of refined power and love. its become a strong tool for me, especially with helping others. that whole song radiates highly absorbable energy. now where in hell could you have scrounged all that up?

     was that the mission statement of that track?

4.16.18  2:11 am   fuck new york. it's a selfish city for selfish people. and besides they're all living on the internet with the rest of the world. there's no real reason to go there and kill yourself when you can kill yourself for much cheaper in nashville or chicago, or new orleans. everybody wants to empty your pockets and watch you bleed from your eyes and ears. or feed you until you vomit.
